mapper.select: select u.ID_USR, u.NAME_USR, u.CI_NAME_USR, u.EMAIL_ADDRESS_USR, u.EMPLOYEE_CODE_USR, u.ACTIVE_FROM_USR, u.ACTIVE_TO_USR, u.LAST_LOGGED_IN_USR, u.LOGIN_NAME_USR, u.CREATED_BY_USR, u.CREATED_ON_USR, u.UPDATED_BY_USR, u.UPDATED_ON_USR, u.ID_ETY_USR, NAME_ETY, u.ID_DESG_ULV_USR, NAME_ULV, u.ID_STATUS_SLV_USR, NAME_SLV from USER_MASTER_USR u left join USER_LOV_ULV d on d.ID_ULV = u.ID_DESG_ULV_USR left join SYSTEM_LOV_SLV s on s.ID_SLV = u.ID_STATUS_SLV_USR left join LEGAL_ENTITY_MASTER_ETY e on e.ID_ETY = u.ID_ETY_USR where u.id_usr=#{id}
